description:
This course explores not only the processes behind operations management, but the importance of innovation in operations management and business competitiveness.
Not sure how innovation applies to operations management? Consider this: Forbes magazine releases an annual list of the top 100 innovative companies around the world. The list includes each company’s five-year average sales growth, net income growth, and innovation premium figures. These figures show how applying innovation to operations management can help make any business more successful.
title: Innovating in Operations Management
